title: VOD spoiler
body: When watching voids to avoid spoilers and you click on the games.  At the title of the vod it will say Game 2 of 3 (*team name* win).  Any way to get rid of that?

replies.body:
Are you talking about the VODS on the [**eSports Page**](http://www.lolesports.com/en_US/vods/na-lcs/na_2017_spring)? You can find playlists of these matches without spoilers on the [**LoL Esports Youtube Channel**](https://www.youtube.com/user/LoLChampSeries/playlists).

I hope this helps! :)
